SEARCH
Package com.paymybuddy.ewallet.repository

Interface TransactionRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Transaction,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Transaction,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Transaction,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Transaction,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Transaction,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Transaction>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Transaction,Integer>
public interface TransactionRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Transaction,Integer>
Repository interface which extends the JPA (Jakarta Persistence API) Repository in order to deal with Derived and JPQL query relative to Transaction entities.
Version:
1.0
Author:
SÃ©bastien Cappon
Singularity :
Method findBySender is created for integration tests purpose only. That's why it's Optional, not List. We're sure that only one entity will be returned.

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM transaction JOIN user ON transaction.transaction_sender = user.user_id ORDER BY user.user_firstname ASC, user.user_lastname ASC", nativeQuery=true) List<Transaction> getTransactions_orderBySenderNameAsc()

    • getTransactions_orderBySenderNameDesc

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM transaction JOIN user ON transaction.transaction_sender = user.user_id ORDER BY user.user_firstname DESC, user.user_lastname DESC", nativeQuery=true) List<Transaction> getTransactions_orderBySenderNameDesc()

    • getTransactionsBetweenUsers_orderByAmountAsc
